title: Pinterest augmented reality expands from beauty products to furniture
content:
It’s almost exactly two years since the first Pinterest augmented reality feature, allowing users to virtually try on different shades of lipstick â€“ which followed a demo of the tech back in 2017. The company has now added a new AR feature, letting you see how furniture from major brands would look in your home …
